en:
批购
(Pī gòu)

Installment purchase

Translations of 批购
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

批
    Installment, Batch, Batches, Batches of, Appropriation
购
    purchase, buy, purchased, shopping, commercially available
ja:

(Pī gòu)
